author: gstein
msg: Avoid calling out to external programs when cleaning or printing help.
We either don't need to call them, or we might not know where they are.
(CALLOUT_OKAY): new flag to determine when calling out is allowed.
(gssapi): only reset to krb5-cnofig if that file exists

author: gstein
msg: (1.3.0): resort "fix issue" to the top. add NEW: to call out the
SCons change. more detail on the authn work, including KeepAlive
